# Equation Alignment Test

## Simple aligned (two equations, align on =)

$$\begin{aligned}
a + b &= c \\
x &= y + z
\end{aligned}$$

## Cases environment

$$f(x) = \begin{cases}
x + 1 & x > 0 \\
0 & x \leq 0
\end{cases}$$

## Multi-column alignment

$$\begin{aligned}
a &= b & c &= d \\
e &= f & g &= h
\end{aligned}$$

## Gathered (no alignment, for comparison)

$$\begin{gathered}
a + b = c \\
x = y + z
\end{gathered}$$
